text: Paul D. Irving (born August 1957) is an American law enforcement officer. In January 2012, he became the Sergeant at Arms of the United States House of Representatives. He replaced Wilson Livingood.Sergeant at Arms-United States House of Representatives He also worked for the United States Secret Service. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:American police officers Category:People from Los Angeles Category:People from Miami Category:People from Tampa, Florida Category:Sergeants at Arms of the United States House of Representatives
title: Paul D. Irving
